methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scroll the virtual scroll list to the item with the specified index (0 based)
methods.description_zh: 将虚拟滚动列表滚动到具有指定索引的项目（从 0 开始）

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the virtual scroll computations; Needed for custom edge-cases
methods.description_zh: 重置虚拟滚动计算;自定义边缘情况需要

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes the virtual scroll list; Use it after appending items
methods.description_zh: 刷新虚拟滚动列表;在附加项后使用

events.name: virtual-scroll
events.description: Emitted when the virtual scroll occurs
events.description_zh: 在虚拟滚动发生时发出

type.description: The type of content: list (default) or table

:items.description: Available list items that will be passed to the scoped slot; For best performance freeze the list of items; Required if 'itemsFn' is not supplied
:items.description_zh: 将传递到范围槽的可用列表项;为了获得最佳性能，请冻结项目列表;如果未提供 'itemsFn'，则为必需

items-size.description: Number of available items in the list; Required and used only if 'itemsFn' is provided
items-size.description_zh: 列表中的可用项数;必需，并且仅在提供 'itemsFn' 时使用

items-fn.description: Function to return the scope for the items to be displayed; Should return an array for items starting from 'from' index for size length; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
items-fn.description_zh: 返回要显示的项目的范围的函数;应返回一个数组，用于从 size length 的 'from' 索引开始的项目;为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围中引用它，不要内联定义它

virtual-scroll-horizontal.description: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode
virtual-scroll-horizontal.description_zh: 使虚拟列表在水平模式下工作

virtual-scroll-slice-size.description: Minimum number of items to render in the virtual list
virtual-scroll-slice-size.description_zh: 要在虚拟列表中呈现的最小项目数

virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-before.description: Ratio of number of items in visible zone to render before it
virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-before.description_zh: 可见区域中的项目数与渲染前的比率

virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-after.description: Ratio of number of items in visible zone to render after it
virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-after.description_zh: 可见区域中的项目数与之后渲染的比率

virtual-scroll-item-size.description: Default size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of an item; This value is used for rendering the initial list; Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item
virtual-scroll-item-size.description_zh: 项目的默认大小（以像素为单位）（如果垂直时为高度，如果水平时为宽度）;此值用于呈现初始列表;尝试使用接近项的最小大小的值

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-start.description: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the start of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision
virtual-scroll-sticky-size-start.description_zh: 列表开头的粘性部分（如果使用）的大小（如果垂直则为高度，如果为水平，则以宽度为单位）;正确的值将提高滚动精度

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-end.description: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the end of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision
virtual-scroll-sticky-size-end.description_zh: 列表末尾的粘性部分（如果使用）的大小（如果垂直则为高度，如果为水平，则以宽度为单位）;正确的值将提高滚动精度

table-colspan.description: The number of columns in the table (you need this if you use table-layout: fixed)
table-colspan.description_zh: 表中的列数（如果您使用 table-layout： fixed，则需要此列）

slots.name: before
slots.description: Template slot for the elements that should be rendered before the list; Suggestion: thead before a table
slots.description_zh: 应在列表之前渲染的元素的模板插槽;建议：在表格前 thead

slots.name: after
slots.description: Template slot for the elements that should be rendered after the list; Suggestion: tfoot after a table
slots.description_zh: 应在列表之后渲染的元素的模板插槽;建议：在桌子后面

slots.name: default
slots.description: Template slot for defining the list item; Suggestion: QItem
slots.description_zh: 用于定义列表项的模板插槽;建议：QItem
